text: +1 to wanting to be able to use something like `vite-plugin-svgr`

What is the best way to use custom fonts in a react project/theme?
• Should custom fonts be in the `src > project` folder, and referenced with a relative path in any `@font-face` rule?
• Or should fonts be uploaded to the account File Manager and referenced with an absolute path?

The docs don't mention anything about a "public" folder:
• <https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/reference/static-assets.html#static-assets>
